<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">[Ghostly Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=133)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 340 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Arundhat](/Deities.aspx?ID=186), [Atreia](/Deities.aspx?ID=101), [Falayna](/Deities.aspx?ID=119), [Falayna](/Deities.aspx?ID=119), [Gravelady's Guard](/Deities.aspx?ID=247), [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 weapon that is either unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target weapon becomes translucent and ghostly, and it can affect material and [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures and objects. It can be wielded by a corporeal or incorporeal creature and gains the effects of the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune. If the weapon is [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) and already has the maximum number of property runes, the wielder can choose one to suppress to gain _ghost touch_.
name: Ghostly Weapon
